info.name: TinyEye Search - WideScreen Results v.5
info.description: It's for A LARGE SCREEN (WideScreen 1920x1080!) # TOTAL REWORK 2020.02 # Less scrolling with this compact Userstyles for Images search results provided by this Firefox Addon: TinEye Reverse Image Search
info.additionalInfo: Less scrolling with this compact Userstyles : - Compact header - Results on the right side - Maximum space for the results items (more results by Row) - Full link in a tooltip, by Hover on results links ... etc.... Test link, search with the extension: La Joconde Portrait de Monna Lisa
